TopicTitle: tlsf_create: Pool size must be between 3208 and 1073745020 bytes.

Articles.Content:
I've crashed twice with this error in the logs. Both times, flying high altitude (27km plus) with heat gauges on.

tlsf\_create: Pool size must be between 3208 and 1073745020 bytes.

Crash!!!

This is on a 32 bit Windows with 4 gig ram with the program size opened to 3gb with a 1 gig ATI radeon.

I'd post the log but both this forum and pastebin says it's too large.

Everything else in the log looks normal.

And it's the same that's happening in the post below. The plane heats up, bars don't go down, game crashes.

[this link](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118658-New-Heat-System-causes-memory-leak)
